name: Faster, Paul
description:
A game about friendship, endless errands and getting drunk in the backseat of a car.

Best played with buddy, with a Xbox controller.

Keyboard commands:

Player 1

  • Move : WASD
  • Rotate : R
  • Take : T

Player 2

  • Move : Arrows
  • Rotate : O
  • Take : P

A game by Vincent Torres and Robin Pouch

Thanks to Cyanide Dansen for the proof-reading and Relou for his playing of Super Mario Galaxy when we thought everything was lost.

Font by Martin Nillsen
